summary: A small mod that allows for the player to view and edit weapon statistics in-game.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[b][color=#00ffff][size=5]THIS MOD IS A SKYRIM NEXUS EXCLUSIVE[/size][/color][/b]




[img]http://s3.postimg.org/q0j6uos6b/Tool_Weapon_Edit.png[/img][/center]

[center][size=7][b][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]REQUIRES SKSE[/url][/b][/size][/center]

[center][youtube]hHkj3McE83U[/youtube][youtube]R6lJ_kVQQs4[/youtube][/center]

[center]
[url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured.png[/img][/url][/center]

[img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/2l3jtk.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24745]Phenderix Ultimate Magic System[/url] a magic system with over 50 new spells, elemental bending, and a new resource system.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25794]Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon:[/url] allows the user to edit weapon values and enchanments.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25961]Phenderix Tool - Spell Stats:[/url] A mod that adds a power that allows you to view spell and magic effect values.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25937]Phenderix Tool - Teleports:[/url] allows the user to teleport to many locations.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5898]Phenderix's Magic Evolved[/url] a magic mod that adds over 200 spells! Recently optimized.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12716]Phenderix's Magic Sounds Improved[/url] makes some of the magic sounds a little less annoying.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22937]Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry[/url] a mod that adds over 200 spells and 100+ npcs along with many areas to explore.
author: phenderix

files.name: Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon - Version 1dot10
files.changelogHtml:
Spell is now a power. (Can now dual wield and use this tool)
Changed Increase/Decrease by 20% to 50%.
Changed scripts and menus a little bit.

files.name: Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon - Version 1dot20
files.changelogHtml:
Added ability to enchant weapons using this mod.
Can now apply Fire, Frost, Shock, or Soul Trap enchant.
You can now also remove all enchantments from a weapon.

files.name: Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon - Version 1dot30
files.changelogHtml:
Magicka cost is now zero. (This is a cheat mod)
Casting sounds removed from the spell.
Name system changed to match other tool mods.

files.name: Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon - Version 1dot40
files.changelogHtml:
Can now view and change weight of weapons.
Can now view and change gold value of weapons.
Weapon name now displayed on view stats page.

files.name: Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon - New Update
files.fileName: Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon - New Update-25794-1-50.zip
files.changelogHtml:
3 new enchantments. (Absorb health/magicka/stamina)
Added increase by 100% option while editing a weapon.
No longer have to steal the tome, just pick it up.
Script changes, some menu changes to account for additions.
